vernac_cmds: Require Import Relations Setoid SetoidList List Multiset PermutSetoid Permutation Omega.
Hypothesis eq_dec : forall x y:A, {x=y} + {~ x=y}.
Lemma multiplicity_In : forall l a, In a l <-> 0 < multiplicity (list_contents l) a.
eapply In_InA, multiplicity_InA in H; eauto with typeclass_instances.
eapply multiplicity_InA, InA_alt in H as (y & -> & H); eauto with typeclass_instances.
Lemma multiplicity_In_O : forall l a, ~ In a l -> multiplicity (list_contents l) a = 0.
intros l a; rewrite multiplicity_In; destruct (multiplicity (list_contents l) a); auto.
Lemma multiplicity_In_S : forall l a, In a l -> multiplicity (list_contents l) a >= 1.
intros l a; rewrite multiplicity_In; auto.
Lemma multiplicity_NoDup : forall l, NoDup l <-> (forall a, multiplicity (list_contents l) a <= 1).
intros; destruct (eq_dec a a0) as [H2|H2]; simpl; auto.
destruct (multiplicity (list_contents l) a); auto with arith.
destruct (eq_dec a a0); simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma NoDup_permut : forall l l', NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x, In x l <-> In x l') -> permutation l l'.
generalize (H a) (H0 a) (H1 a); clear H H0 H1.
Lemma permut_In_In : forall l1 l2 e, permutation l1 l2 -> In e l1 -> In e l2.
unfold PermutSetoid.permutation, meq; intros l1 l2 e P IN.
destruct (In_dec eq_dec e l2) as [H|H]; auto.
Lemma permut_cons_In : forall l1 l2 e, permutation (e :: l1) l2 -> In e l2.
Lemma permut_nil : forall l, permutation l nil -> l = nil.
intro l; destruct l as [ | e l ]; trivial.
Lemma permutation_Permutation : forall l l', Permutation l l' <-> permutation l l'.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.
Lemma permut_length_1: forall a b, permutation (a :: nil) (b :: nil) -> a=b.
intros a b; unfold PermutSetoid.permutation, meq; intro P; generalize (P b); clear P; simpl.
destruct (eq_dec b b) as [H|H]; [ | destruct H; auto].
destruct (eq_dec a b); simpl; auto; intros; discriminate.
Lemma permut_length_2 : forall a1 b1 a2 b2, permutation (a1 :: b1 :: nil) (a2 :: b2 :: nil) -> (a1=a2) /\ (b1=b2) \/ (a1=b2) /\ (a2=b1).
intros a1 b1 a2 b2 P.
destruct (eq_dec a1 a) as [H2|H2]; destruct (eq_dec a2 a) as [H3|H3]; auto.
destruct (eq_dec a1 a) as [H2|H2]; destruct (eq_dec b2 a) as [H3|H3]; auto.
Lemma permut_length : forall l1 l2, permutation l1 l2 -> length l1 = length l2.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.
Variable eqB_dec : forall x y:B, { x=y }+{ ~x=y }.
Lemma permutation_map : forall f l1 l2, permutation l1 l2 -> PermutSetoid.permutation _ eqB_dec (map f l1) (map f l2).
intros l2 P; rewrite (permut_nil (permut_sym P)); apply permut_refl.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.

command: eapply In_InA, multiplicity_InA in H; eauto with typeclass_instances.
eapply multiplicity_InA, InA_alt in H as (y & -> & H); eauto with typeclass_instances.
intros l a; rewrite multiplicity_In; destruct (multiplicity (list_contents l) a); auto.
intros l a; rewrite multiplicity_In; auto.
intros; destruct (eq_dec a a0) as [H2|H2]; simpl; auto.
destruct (multiplicity (list_contents l) a); auto with arith.
destruct (eq_dec a a0); simpl; auto with arith.
generalize (H a) (H0 a) (H1 a); clear H H0 H1.
unfold PermutSetoid.permutation, meq; intros l1 l2 e P IN.
destruct (In_dec eq_dec e l2) as [H|H]; auto.
intro l; destruct l as [ | e l ]; trivial.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.
intros a b; unfold PermutSetoid.permutation, meq; intro P; generalize (P b); clear P; simpl.
destruct (eq_dec b b) as [H|H]; [ | destruct H; auto].
destruct (eq_dec a b); simpl; auto; intros; discriminate.
intros a1 b1 a2 b2 P.
destruct (eq_dec a1 a) as [H2|H2]; destruct (eq_dec a2 a) as [H3|H3]; auto.
destruct (eq_dec a1 a) as [H2|H2]; destruct (eq_dec b2 a) as [H3|H3]; auto.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.
intros l2 P; rewrite (permut_nil (permut_sym P)); apply permut_refl.
apply permut_remove_hd with a; auto with typeclass_instances.
